TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content:
The license in release 1.7.6 is [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0/](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0/) so if you have that file you can do whatever you please. BTW only the readme is updated, the license is still there ;-)

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> So do we have permission to edit your parts (me, Jeast, Sampa)? 
> Well, I'd have helped you earlier, but I just felt too slow in comparison with you, I wouldn't been able to keep up with you. And you seemed to manage everything alone just fine.

I'm still working on the IVA wich is a totally seperate project outside of the CSS.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-02T20:03:59Z" title="09/02/2015 08:03  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 2, 2015</time> by Jeast**

Temporary lock.

Thread sanitized, but it will remain locked as it serves no further purpose. As I understand the latest released version of this mod was subject to a CC-BY-SA 2.0 license, which means that derivative works can be made from anything that was included in that release, so long as the license terms are abided by.
